label: Who Were They?
title: Bataan Death March and Hellships

detailImages.title: Wiley Graduate
detailImages.caption: Mack Hopkins grew up in Marshall, Texas. His parents taught at Wiley University. In 1942, Mack graduated from Wiley. Soon afterwards, he qualified to join the Tuskegee Airmen.
